content: of round fasten_off 60 position the two petals pieces with wrong sides together and then using tan yarn a join them together single_crochet through both pieces starting on the ride side edge of any petal single_crochet through both pieces all the way around the petals working one single_crochet into every st along the petal edges in the top point of each petal work 3sc in the slip_stitch between each petal work a slip_stitch instead of a single_crochet continue in this way around all of the edges of the petals join to first st and fasten_off stitch or glue the petal to the head as shown pushing the centre into the indent on the front of the head tip hot glue works really well for this step congratulations your junior demogorgon is complete 5
